What's cool about it:

    Buy Guacamelee! Gold Edition and get Tales From Space: Mutant Blobs Attack absolutely and completely FREE!
    A modern Metroid-vania style action-platformer-brawler set in a magical Mexican inspired world.
    Beautiful graphics, lavishly detailed backgrounds, smoothly animated characters, and muchos parallax scrolling.
    Non-Stop Fighting Action. An extensive move list, advanced combo engine, and large variety of enemies.
    Multi-dimensional Platforming. Instantly swap between the Worlds of Living and Dead to outwit impossible terrain, and reach new locations.

Overview:

Guacamelee! Gold Edition is an amazing combination of platformer and fighter, set in a magical Mexican inspired world. Take control of Juan Aquacate, a lowly agave farmer turned superhuman luchador, who battles through lands living and dead to rescue his true love.

Guacamelee! builds upon the classic open-world Metroid-vania style of games by adding a deceivingly deep combat system, a dimension switching mechanic that dynamically changes the level, and local co-operative same-screen multiplayer for the entire story. Guacamelee! blurs the boundaries between fighting and platforming by providing moves that that are useful for both traversal and combat. Gorgeous graphics, tiny chickens, and rooster uppercuts await.

Controller support: Supports the Xbox 360 Controller and other XInput-compatible controllers.

Minimum system requirements: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8, 2.0 GHz+ Dual Core Processor or higher, 512 MB RAM, Graphics: 256 MB VRAM with Shader Model 3.0 support, DirectX9.0c, 800 MB of available HD Space


Install and Play.
